Actually we've had several exceptional cams the last couple weeks, so this is a huge disappointment, and I do expect better. The 2012 cam was amazingly good. The New Moon cam was watchable and is looking better each generation. My niece about pissed herself when I gave her a copy at Thanksgiving dinner, and was thrilled with the quality. I'd rather wait a week, or a month to watch this on a decent TS.

Quite watchable. Thanks for the upload zingooo!!!

Rated as a CAM: A7 / V8

For those rating based on DVD rips, please remember what the word CAM means.

The first minute or two have a funny angle issue due to the theater projection, not the cam. Sound can be a bit tinny but is rather clear and quite audible. Some scenes can be a bit dark which should not be a surprise. 

Great work and thank you!!! :)
